titles.title: Expanding Financial Access for Underserved Communities Act
Expanding Financial Access for Underserved Communities Act
A bill to amend the Federal Credit Union Act to permit credit unions to serve certain underserved areas, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary:
Expanding Financial Access for Underserved Communities Act
This bill eases credit union membership requirements to allow more access for persons in underserved areas. A credit union must, however, submit a business and marketing plan to the National Credit Union Administration explaining the credit union's ability and intent to serve such population.
The bill also excludes loans made to members in underserved areas from certain credit union limits on member business loans.
